Description: REDUCED to rent this amazing 3 Bedroom Apartment. Completely renovated with two floors of living space! This 3 Bedroom Apartment, not only has a beautiful open floor plan with hardwood floors throughout the two floors of living space, but all stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, built in microwave, central a/c and heat and two full baths! The amazing 3 bedroom also has a washer and dryer in the unit just for your use! One car off street parking spot is included in the rent. Centrally located near 93 and major routes as well as the bus to take you to the Wellington T! This is available for 9/1, but possibly sooner. The is a FEE apartment. You must contact listing agent for scheduled showings. Utilities NOT included. NO pets and NO smoking of any kind allowed. MUST good credit.
